external_reference_id.description: max length = 200. Secondary identifier. This value must be unique.

drawdown_bank_account_number.description:
max length = 17
required only if funding_method is 'ach_debit' or 'reverse_wire'

drawdown_bank_routing_number.description:
max length = 9
required only if funding_method is 'ach_debit' or 'reverse_wire'

metadata.description: Array of name/value pairs.The name can be any character string not beginning with _ with a max length of 25 characters, The value can have a max length of 100 chars and can be null.

funding_notification.description: Indicates if this contact should receive funding notifications.

refund_notification.description: Indicates if this contact should receive refund notifications.

id.description: This will be generated by Finexio.

external_reference_id.description:
max length = 100
This value must be unique.

primary.description: Indicates whether the contact is the primary contact.

bank_account_number.description:
max length = 17
required when payment_method is ACH or Wire
Update allowed only with permission.

bank_routing_number.description:
max length = 9
required when payment_method is ACH or Wire
Update allowed only with permission.

payment_method.description:
accepts one of these values: [ 'ACH', 'Card', 'PrintedCheck','Wire' ]. Default ACH if no value specified.
Update allowed only with permission.

address_1.description:
max length = 40
required only if payment_method is PrintedCheck

city.description:
max length = 40
required only if payment_method is PrintedCheck

state.description:
required only if payment_method is PrintedCheck
accepts one of these values: [ 'AL', 'AK', 'AS', 'AZ', 'AR', 'AA', 'AE', 'AP', 'CA', 'CO', 'CT', 'DE', 'DC', 'FL', 'GA', 'GU', 'HI', 'ID', 'IL', 'IN', 'IA', 'KS', 'KY', 'LA', 'ME', 'MD', 'MA', 'MI', 'MN', 'MS', 'MO', 'MT', 'NE', 'NV', 'NH', 'NJ', 'NM', 'NY', 'NC', 'ND', 'MP', 'OH', 'OK', 'OR', 'PA', 'PR', 'RI', 'SC', 'SD', 'TN', 'TX', 'UT', 'VT', 'VI', 'VA', 'WA', 'WV', 'WI', 'WY', 'AB', 'BC', 'MB', 'NB', 'NL', 'NT', 'NS', 'NU', 'ON', 'PE', 'QC', 'SK', 'YT' ]

zipcode.description:
max length = 10
required only if payment_method is PrintedCheck

country.description: accepts one of these values: [ 'CAN', 'UMI', 'USA' ]. Default USA if no value specified.

remit_email.description: required if payment_method is Card/ACH or payment_method is PrintedCheck and country is CAN.

bank_account_number.description:
max length = 17
required when payment_method is ACH or Wire

bank_routing_number.description:
max length = 9
required when payment_method is ACH or Wire

payment_method.description: accepts one of these values: [ 'ACH', 'Card', 'PrintedCheck','Wire' ]. Default ACH if no value specified.

internal_id.description: max length = 100. Secondary identifier for this counterparty. This value must be unique for counterparty type.

payment_terms.description: Allowed values: min = 0, max = 365. Payment terms is optional field. This is an integer field and represents No. of days.

ineligible_for_conversion.description: Supplier conversion eligibility determines if Finexio SHOULD NOT reach out to this supplier due to high sensitivity or special payment arrangements or contracted terms.

notes.description: max length = 1000. Optional information about supplier.

id.description: Unique identifier for the invoice. This field is read-only.

amount_cents.description: Invoice amount in specified currency's smallest unit. e.g. $10 would be represented as 1000.

discount_amount_cents.description: Optional invoice discount amount in specified currency's smallest unit.

invoice_date.description: Date of invoice provided by recipient. Must be +/- 365 days from today.

invoice_number.description: Uniquely identifies this invoice for recipient.

note.description: Optional additional information you would like to include regarding this invoice.

originating_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your organization's internal counterparties (Buyer) that will send payment.

receiving_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your external counterparties (Supplier) that will receive invoice payment.

metadata.description: Additional private data represented as key-value pairs. Both the key and value must be strings or integers.

payment_id.description: The id of the most recent Payment associated with this invoice.

reconciliation_id.description: A string to identify the invoice in your accounting system.

account_number.description: This sensitive information is stored encrypted and can only be retrieved through the API.

amount_cents.description: Invoice amount in specified currency's smallest unit. e.g. $10 would be represented as 1000.

invoice_date.description: Date of invoice provided by recipient. Must be +/- 365 days from today.

invoice_number.description: Uniquely identifies this invoice for recipient.

discount_amount_cents.description: Optional invoice discount amount in specified currency's smallest unit.

note.description: The optional additional information you would like to include regarding this invoice.

originating_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your organization's internal counterparties (Buyer) that will send payment.

receiving_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your external counterparties (Supplier) that will receive payment.

metadata.description: Additional private data represented as key-value pairs. Both the key and value must be strings or integers.

currency.description: Currency to be used for invoice payment. The accepted value is 'USD'

reconciliation_id.description: A string to identify the invoice in your accounting system.

account_number.description: This sensitive information is stored encrypted and can only be retrieved through the API.

originating_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your organization's internal counterparties (Buyer) that will send payment.

receiving_counterparty_id.description: The ID of one of your external counterparties (Supplier) that will receive payment.

tracking_id.description: Used to reference this payment when communicating with Finexio's Customer Support and Payment Operations teams.

invoices.description: List of invoices associated with this payment.

remit_address_1.description:
max length = 40
required only if payment_method is 'Check'

remit_city.description:
max length = 40
required only if payment_method is 'Check'

remit_state.description:
accepts one of these values: [ 'AL', 'AK', 'AS', 'AZ', 'AR', 'AA', 'AE', 'AP', 'CA', 'CO', 'CT', 'DE', 'DC', 'FL', 'GA', 'GU', 'HI', 'ID', 'IL', 'IN', 'IA', 'KS', 'KY', 'LA', 'ME', 'MD', 'MA', 'MI', 'MN', 'MS', 'MO', 'MT', 'NE', 'NV', 'NH', 'NJ', 'NM', 'NY', 'NC', 'ND', 'MP', 'OH', 'OK', 'OR', 'PA', 'PR', 'RI', 'SC', 'SD', 'TN', 'TX', 'UT', 'VT', 'VI', 'VA', 'WA', 'WV', 'WI', 'WY', 'AB', 'BC', 'MB', 'NB', 'NL', 'NT', 'NS', 'NU', 'ON', 'PE', 'QC', 'SK', 'YT' ].
required only if payment_method is 'Check'

remit_zipcode.description:
max length = 10
required only if payment_method is 'Check'

remit_country.description:
accepts one of these values: [ 'CAN', 'UMI', 'USA' ].
required only if payment_method is 'Check'

corporate_country.description: accepts one of these values: [ 'CAN', 'UMI', 'USA' ]. Default USA if no value specified.

external_reference_id.description: max length = 200. Secondary identifier. This value must be unique.

remit_email.description: required only if payment_method is 'Card' and delivery_method is 'Email'.

bank_account_number.description:
max length = 17
required only if payment_method is 'ACH' or 'Wire' or 'FinexioExpress'.
It can't contain non-numeric characters.

bank_routing_number.description:
max length = 9
required only if payment_method is 'ACH' or 'Wire' or 'FinexioExpress'.

delivery_method.description:
accepts one of these values: [ 'Mail', 'Email', 'Portal','Phone' ] and can be null.
Required only if payment_method is other than ACH and Wire.

payment_terms.description: Allowed values: min = 0, max = 365. Payment terms is optional field. This is an integer field and represents No. of days.

ineligible_for_conversion.description: Supplier conversion eligibility determines if Finexio SHOULD NOT reach out to this supplier due to high sensitivity or special payment arrangements or contracted terms.

twelve_month_payment_count.description: This is related to spend data and indicates the number of payments made to that supplier over the last 12 months.

twelve_month_spend.description: This is related to spend data and indicates the total dollar amount paid to that supplier over the last 12 months.

notes.description:
max length = 1000
Optional information about supplier.

metadata.description: Array of name/value pairs.The name can be any character string not beginning with _ with a max length of 25 characters, The value can have a max length of 100 chars and can be null.

enabled.description: Used to indicate if the supplier is enabled and therefore payable.

internal_payments.description: Payments will be made by Finexio staff using the Phone or Portal delivery method.

payment_notification.description: Indicates whether notifications of payments need to be sent using the email value.

event.description: Name of event to connect with

content_type.description: Desired content type for requests to this callback.
